TEXT.TITLE: <HARD ROCK CAFE PLC> SETS INITIAL U.S. OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Hard Rock Cafe PLC said it has filed for an initial U.S. offering of 2,240,000 American Depositary Shares representing 11.2 mln Class A ordinary shares. It said 240,000 of the ADS's will be sold by a current shareholder. Lead underwriter is <Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc>. The company said proceeds will be used for the financing of additional restaurants, the expansion of existing restaurants and retail operations and the repayment of debt. Reuter
